description: A modern, performance-optimized portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS

SMTP_HOST.description: SMTP server hostname (Use: smtp.gmail.com for Gmail)

SMTP_PORT.description: SMTP server port (Use 587 for Gmail with TLS)

SMTP_USER.description: Your Gmail address (e.g., yourname@gmail.com) - Must enable 2FA and create App Password

SMTP_PASSWORD.description: Gmail App Password (16 characters, no spaces) - NOT your regular password! Get it from: https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords

MAIL_FROM.description: Email address to send from (same as SMTP_USER)

NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of your deployed application (leave empty for auto-detection)
